rules_text:
Create two 1/1 red Soldier creature tokens.
Coalesce {4}{R}{R} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for {4}{R}{R}. If you do, it enters as a Soldier Horror creature after it resolves. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
